metadata.Title: CVE-2018-15474 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description: ** DISPUTED ** CSV Injection (aka Excel Macro Injection or Formula Injection) in /lib/plugins/usermanager/admin.php in DokuWiki 2018-04-22a and earlier allows remote attackers to exfiltrate sensitive data and to execute arbitrary code via a value that is mishandled in a CSV export. NOTE: the vendor has stated "this is not a security problem in DokuWiki."

criterions.comment: dokuwiki package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
